title: A Double Doctoral Triumph: Celebrating Two PhD Graduates from Our Lab
text: Today, we proudly celebrate the remarkable achievement of two outstanding scholars from our labâ€”Laila Abdelhafeez and Yongyi Liu, as they officially graduate with their PhDs. This milestone marks the culmination of years of dedication, perseverance, and impactful research. Both Laila and Yongyi have made significant contributions to their fields, and their accomplishments reflect the strength of collaboration, curiosity, and resilience fostered within our lab. Please join us in congratulating them on this well-deserved success and wishing them the very best in their future endeavors.

title: MDM conference 2025: From Riverside To Irvine
text: We are proud to have collaborated on the organization of the Mobile Data Management Conference 2025, with Prof. Amr serving as Conference Chair and two of our lab members, Ahmed Abdelmaguid and Yiyang Bian, contributing as volunteers.
